qr_transfer_details: No need to enter information. Instant payment confirmation, fast and with fewer errors.
cash_payment_title: Pay at the bus station/when boarding
cash_payment_description: You can pay the driver when boarding the vehicle.
booking_confirmation_message: You will soon receive the vehicle's license plate, driver's phone number, and can easily change pick-up and drop-off points after booking.
